Articles.Content:
So a while ago I installed TUFX and I really like it, the problem is that with some configs parts look blurry wich isn't very good, I play on 720p and I use this TUFX configs
Pallete
Alverro's 
Zorg's
Quazspace

When I activate the default TUFX configs that does not happen and parts look normal.
I hope someone can help
Edit: I also use EVE with spectra, parallax (issue existed before I added it) waterfall and Distant Object enhancements

Edited October 26, 2021 by Kapitalizing Every Word
